teamMembers.name: Dr. Madhura Gurjar
teamMembers.title: Owner & Physical Therapist
teamMembers.bio: Dr. Madhura Gurjar is the founder and owner of Allied Health Solutions. She earned her Master's degree in Physical Therapy from India and has been practicing in the United States since 2010. Madhura is certified in McKenzie Method (MDT) and specializes in orthopedic and manual therapy. Her passion for helping patients achieve their recovery goals drives her to provide personalized, evidence-based care.
education: Master of Science in Physical Therapy

teamMembers.name: Melissa Smith
teamMembers.title: Physical Therapist
teamMembers.bio: Melissa is a dedicated physical therapist with expertise in treating various conditions. She specializes in pediatric physical therapy and has extensive experience working with children with various developmental and orthopedic conditions. Melissa's patient-centered approach ensures each individual receives customized care.

teamMembers.name: Patricia Heimann
teamMembers.title: Physical Therapist
teamMembers.bio: Patricia is a certified hand therapist with specialized training in treating upper extremity conditions. She has extensive experience in treating hand, wrist, and elbow injuries and conditions. Patricia's expertise in custom splinting and manual therapy helps patients regain function and return to their daily activities.

teamMembers.name: Mrunmayee Kulkarni
teamMembers.title: Physical Therapist
teamMembers.bio: Mrunmayee is a skilled physical therapist who specializes in treating various musculoskeletal conditions. She has a special interest in vestibular rehabilitation and balance training. Her comprehensive approach to patient care includes manual therapy, therapeutic exercise, and patient education.

teamMembers.name: Sarah Thomas
teamMembers.title: Physical Therapist
teamMembers.bio: Sarah is a compassionate physical therapist with experience in treating a variety of conditions. She specializes in pelvic floor physical therapy and women's health. Sarah's gentle approach and specialized training help patients overcome conditions that significantly impact their quality of life.

teamMembers.name: Sanika Kulkarni
teamMembers.title: Physical Therapist
teamMembers.bio: Sanika is an enthusiastic physical therapist dedicated to helping patients achieve their rehabilitation goals. She has experience treating various orthopedic and neurological conditions. Sanika's patient-centered approach focuses on functional outcomes and improving quality of life.

teamMembers.name: Priyanka Jain
teamMembers.title: Physical Therapist
teamMembers.bio: Priyanka is a dedicated physical therapist with expertise in treating sports injuries and orthopedic conditions. She is passionate about helping athletes and active individuals return to their sport or activity. Priyanka uses evidence-based treatments to optimize recovery and prevent future injuries.

teamMembers.name: Tony Crespo
teamMembers.title: Physical Therapist
teamMembers.bio: Tony is an experienced physical therapist specializing in orthopedic and sports rehabilitation. His expertise in manual therapy and therapeutic exercise helps patients recover from injuries and improve their physical function. Tony's enthusiastic approach motivates patients throughout their recovery journey.
